participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, with a strong focus on achieving my career goals. I thrive in competitive environments.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Sophie Allen
participant_2.personality: Curious and playful, I love exploring new things and enjoying my free time with friends. I often express my emotions freely.
participant_2.background: i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

content.text: I just graduated with an economics degree
I graduated with a business degree.
